# The `FCmpInst` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This instruction compares its operands according to the predicate given to the constructor. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This instruction compares its operands according to the predicate given to the constructor.

It only operates on floating point values or packed vectors of floating point values. The operands must be identical types. Represents a floating point comparison operator.

Definition at line 1379 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">Instructions.h</a>.

### swapOperands() {#ad3be45a337f5541511a869dd2dcd7a38}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void llvm::FCmpInst::swapOperands ()"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Exchange the two operands to this instruction in such a way that it does not modify the semantics of the instruction.

The predicate value may be changed to retain the same result if the predicate is order dependent (e.g. ult). Swap operands and adjust predicate.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h/#l01451">1451</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">Instructions.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
